sn4.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn4.10:2.2: Gamaniyo samparayo, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam.
sn4.10:2.4: Yo, bhikkhave, ciram jivati, so vassasatam appam va bhiyyo”ti.
sn4.10:3.1: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.10:6.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
